verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I can see Jesus hangin' on a cross
i can see jesus hangin' on a cross
i can see jesus hangin' on a cross
he came looking for the lost
and love has come
love has come
love has come
and He's given me hope to carry on

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I can hear jesus saying father forgive
i can hear jesus saying father forgive
i can hear jesus saying father forgive
what a thing He did
love has come
love has come
love has come
and He's given me hope to carry on

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I can see love, love is all i want to see
love can make a begger rich
it can set a prisoner free
I know He can do it for you
god knows He did it for me
And I can see love
love is all i want to show you love
